data.eml:eml: Vespidae (Hymenoptera) of the Pothwar region of Punjab, Pakistan

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Siddiqui, Junaid Ali, Bodlah, Imran, Carpenter, James M., Naeem, Muhammad, Ahmad, Munir, Bodlah, Muhammad Adnan (2015): Vespidae (Hymenoptera) of the Pothwar region of Punjab, Pakistan. Zootaxa 3914 (5): 501-524, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3914.5.1
